description: Linear Company seeks a skilled Software Developer taking responsibilities include developing high-quality software, executing tasks in the development life cycle, and collaborating with teams.

Notion Solutions seeks a talented Web Developer to design, code, and modify websites. Candidates should have expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and CMS, with 2+ years of experience and a Bachelor's degree preferred.

Spline Studio, a leader in data-driven insights offers a role involves analyzing complex data sets, developing algorithms, and creating predictive models. Candidates should have a strong background in statistics, machine learning in relevant field is  preferred

Raycast corp Studios seeks a UI/UX Designer in London, UK, to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. Candidates should have a strong portfolio showcasing proficiency in design tools and understanding of user-centric design principles.
Loom Tech Co. is hiring a Frontend Developer in San Francisco, CA, to build innovative user interfaces. Candidates should be proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks.

Trainline Cloud Solutions is seeking a DevOps Engineer in Boston,  to streamline our software development processes. The role involves automating and optimizing infrastructure, deploying and monitoring applications. Candidates should have strong programming skills, experience with cloud platforms.
Linear Company seeks a skilled Software Developer taking responsibilities include developing high-quality software, executing tasks in the development life cycle, and collaborating with teams.
